concepts.label: The Ego
concepts.definition: The center of conscious identity and agency in Jungian psychology.

concepts.label: The Shadow
concepts.definition: Rejected or disowned psychic contents that seek recognition and integration.

concepts.label: Anima
concepts.definition: The inner feminine image in the male psyche, mediating relation to the unconscious.

concepts.label: Animus
concepts.definition: The inner masculine image in the female psyche, shaping judgment and logos-orientation.

concepts.label: The Self
concepts.definition: The totality archetype that orders psyche toward wholeness and integration.

concepts.label: Individuation
concepts.definition: The lifelong process of integrating conscious and unconscious contents into wholeness.

concepts.label: Archetype
concepts.definition: A universal structural pattern of the collective unconscious expressed in symbols and myths.

concepts.label: Coniunctio
concepts.definition: The symbolic union of opposites represented in alchemical transformation imagery.
